law.catch_line: Fund exceeding ten million dollars -- Use of fund -- Disposition of excess.

text.section: If at the end of any fiscal year the moneys and securities to the credit of the state fire and tornado insurance fund exceed ten million dollars ($10,000,000), any such excess shall be transferred to the general fund.
The moneys and securities to the credit of the state fire and tornado insurance fund shall not be used for any purpose unrelated to fund operations.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 4, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 1. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 1. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 4. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4636-35.
